HTMLTableElement.tBodies

The HTMLTableElement.tBodies read-only property returns a live HTMLCollection of the table bodies.

Although the property is read-only, the returned object is live and allows the modification of its content.

The collection returned includes implicit <tbody> elements. E.g.

<table>
  <tr>
    <td>cell one</td>
  </tr>
</table>

The HTML DOM generated from the above HTML will have a <tbody> element even though the tags are not included in the source HTML.

Syntax

HTMLCollectionObject = table.tBodies

Example

length(mytable.tBodies);

Specifications

Specification Status Comment
Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 HTML Specification
The definition of 'tBodies' in that specification.		 Obsolete Returns a collection of the table bodies (including implicit ones)
Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 HTML Specification
The definition of 'Interface HTMLCollection' in that specification.		 Obsolete An HTMLCollection is a list of nodes. An individual node may be accessed by either ordinal index or the node's name or id attributes.
